Thanks to Gay Jean-Christophe for details in this page.

You can checkout and build using the following commands:
  # `svn checkout http://hadoop-stream-mapreduce.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ local-mapreduce-hadoop-stream`
  # `cd local-mapreduce-hadoop-stream`
  # `autoreconf --install`
  # `./configure`
  # `make`
  # `make install`

If you want more control over the process, here is an equivalent sequence: 
  # `svn checkout http://hadoop-stream-mapreduce.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ local-mapreduce-hadoop-stream`
  # `cd local-mapreduce-hadoop-stream`
  # `autoheader`
  # `aclocal`
  # `autoconf`
  # `touch ./NEWS ./README ./AUTHORS ./ChangeLog`
  # `automake --add-missing`
  # `./configure`
  # `make`
  # `make install`
